name: Adult Cave Dragon
description: The Adult Cave Dragon boasts immense size, a dark armored hide, and a menacing presence, equipped with numerous spiked appendages that enhance its threat in close combat.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate darkness and burrow stealthily makes it an unpredictable and dangerous foe in its domain.
goals: Typically seeks to protect its lair and hoard, threatening any intruders.
relations: May be encountered with other dragons or large subterranean creatures.
environment: Subterranean environments such as caves and underground ruins.
strengths: High physical power, resilience, and unique abilities like Darkness Aura and burrowing.
weaknesses: Relatively lower Dexterity compared to its strength and constitution.
attacks: Can use a frightful presence to instill fear, followed by powerful melee attacks with bite, claw, and tail strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Poison Breath: A devastating cone attack that can inflict significant poison damage and status effects.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and tremorsense up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect threats in complete darkness.
skills: Proficient in Perception, enabling it to detect enemies effectively.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and conditions related to being blinded or poisoned.
Can create pockets of magical darkness that negate darkvision.
Has legendary resistance to automatically succeed on failed saving throws a limited number of times per day.
Can burrow through earth, leaving tunnels or moving undetected beneath the surface.
Has a reactive ability with Ruff Spikes, adding tactical defense against intruders.
